panels.description: Shows the number of active tasks
panels.title: Active tasks

panels.description: Shows the number of Max tasks
panels.title: Max tasks

panels.description: Shows the total number of failed tasks
panels.title: Failed Tasks Total

panels.description: Shows the total number of completed tasks per minute
panels.title: Completed Tasks Total per minute

panels.description: Shows the memory used
panels.title: Memory Used

panels.description: Total amount of memory available for storage.
panels.title: Max Memory

panels.description: Resident Set Size: number of pages the process has in real memory. This is just the pages which count toward text, data, or stack space. This does not include pages which have not been demand-loaded in, or which are swapped out.
panels.title: Process Tree JVM RSS Memory

panels.description: Virtual memory size in bytes.
panels.title: Process Tree JVM VMemory

panels.description: Total minor GC count per minute. For example, the garbage collector is one of Copy, PS Scavenge, ParNew, G1 Young Generation and so on.
panels.title: Minor GC Count total

panels.description: Total major GC count per minute. For example, the garbage collector is one of MarkSweepCompact, PS MarkSweep, ConcurrentMarkSweep, G1 Old Generation and so on.
panels.title: Major GC Count total

panels.description: Elapsed total minor GC time per minute.
panels.title: Minor GC Time

panels.description: Elapsed total major GC time per minute.
panels.title: Major GC Time

panels.description: Shows total cores used per executor
panels.title: total Cores

panels.description: Shows disk used
panels.title: disk used

panels.description: Shows driver block manager max on heap memory
panels.title: maxOnHeapMem

panels.description: Shows driver block manager current remaining on heap memory
panels.title: remainingOnHeapMem

panels.description: Shows the number of all DAGScheduler jobs per minute
panels.title: DAGScheduler jobs per minute

panels.description: Shows the number of all DAGScheduler current active jobs
panels.title: DAGScheduler active jobs number

panels.description: Shows DAGScheduler processed messages per minute
panels.title: DAGScheduler processed messages per minute

panels.description: Shows DAGScheduler mean message processing time
panels.title: Mean message processing time

panels.description: JVM CPU time per minute
panels.title: CPU time

panels.description: Shows total streaming Completed Batch jobs per minute
panels.title: Completed Batch jobs per minute

panels.description: Shows retained streaming Completed Batch jobs
panels.title: Retained Completed Batch jobs

panels.description: Shows the time from processing start time of the last completed batch
panels.title: Time from processing start time of the last completed batch

panels.description: Shows the time from processing end time of the last completed batch
panels.title: Time from processing end time of the last completed batch

panels.description: Shows the time from submission of the last completed batch
panels.title: Time from submission of the last completed batch

panels.description: Shows the number of events posted per minute
panels.title: Events posted per minute

panels.description: streaming scheduler StreamingListenerBus Count per minute
panels.title: streaming scheduler StreamingListenerBus Count per minute
